description.content: A beautiful machine to extract the most delicious shots of espresso, the Bella Precision features everything needed in a coffee machine to make the best coffee, including the classic E61 Grouphead, insulated Copper Boiler and polished Stainless steel frame for a timeless and long lasting build.

features.title: Lever Espresso Control
features.content: Flick the lever up to start brewing and down to stop and precisely measure your shot.
